org.openmobster.core.mobileCloud.api.push
Class MobilePush

java.lang.Object
  org.openmobster.core.mobileCloud.api.push.MobilePush

public final class MobilePush
extends Object

A MobilePush represents a server notification containing meta information about the set of MobileBeans whose state is out-of-sync with that of the server. The MobilePush is processed by the application to refresh the state of these MobileBeans before their continued usage within the application

Author:
openmobster@gmail.com
